footer.tagline: Your trusted platform for discovering local businesses and services. Connect with verified providers in your area.

hero.title: Find the Best Local Services
hero.subtitle: Search thousands of businesses, read reviews, and connect with local service providers in your area.

featured.title: Featured
featured.subtitle: Discover top-rated local businesses recommended by your community

home.noOffers: No current offers. Approved offers within their start and end dates will appear here.

howItWorks.title: How
howItWorks.subtitle: Finding the right local service has never been easier. Here's how it works.
howItWorks.searchDesc: Enter what you're looking for and your location to find nearby services
howItWorks.discoverDesc: Browse through listings, view locations on the map, and filter by your preferences
howItWorks.compareDesc: Read reviews, check ratings, and compare prices to make informed decisions
howItWorks.connectDesc: Contact businesses directly, book appointments, and get the service you need

cta.title: Grow Your Business with FindX
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already reaching new customers through our platform. Get discovered by people actively searching for your services.

category.title: Browse by
category.subtitle: Explore our wide range of categories to find exactly what you need

search.locationDeniedHint: Or type your city or address in the location field and search to find businesses near that area.
search.locationRequiresHttpsHint: Use this site via https:// for "Near Me", or enter a city or address in the location field above.

reviews.noReviews: No reviews yet. Be the first to review!
